additionalTextInformation.text:
The present lot will be sold with a photo certificate dated Vienna 11th December, 1931, signed by Gustav Gluck attributing the present work in full to Cranach the Younger. 

[Sotheby's online database; http://www.sothebys.com/en/auctions/ecatalogue/2005/old-master-paintings-n08061/lot.144.html?locale=en; accessed 21-03-2019]

pageContext.inscription:
- inscribed and dated upper centre:
'IOHANNIS VIII/WER VNTEREVCH ON SVNDE IST DER WERFFE DEN ERSTEN STEIN AVF SIE/1554'
[Sotheby's online database; http://www.sothebys.com/en/auctions/ecatalogue/2005/old-master-paintings-n08061/lot.144.html?locale=en; accessed 21-03-2019]
